item.title: Replay-System in a Multi-User VR-Environment
item.description: Technologies: Unity3d Languages: C# In my master’s thesis I had to develop a replay system in Unity3d for the already developed framework from my time as a research assistant. Above all, the system should work in a multiplayer environment. The challenge was to develop a deterministic replay system that can contain multiple timelines. The timelines each contain a gameplay of a gaming session. These can be saved, loaded and played back.
